channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: 60 years, £40 billion: The UK taxpayers' cost to revamp British Parliament. How does India compare?
Who is Ritu Tawde, Mumbai’s new mayor? Why is her appointment historic?
Explained: The racist history behind Obama ape video shared by Trump
Explained: What we can gauge from the the India-US interim trade framework
This Week in Explainers: Ghaziabad sisters’ suicide and the K-wave overwhelming India
Pakistan mosque blast: Did a suicide bomber detonate explosives after being halted by guards?
Talking to an arsonist isn’t diplomacy: The fatal flaw in Tharoor’s Pakistan policy
item.description: Shashi Tharoor’s heart may be in the right place, and his desire for peace sincere and well-intentioned. But Pakistan is not a normal state — and normal rules do not apply to it

item.title: Deal or no deal, India should remain cautious of Trump
item.description: India should never allow Donald Trump the illusion that he is in the driver’s seat

item.title: Beyond Trumpian tariffs: Trade deal fortifies India-US ties, boosts global supply goals
item.description: Beyond tariff cuts, the Trump-Modi understanding reflects India’s calibrated alignment with the West and its ambition to anchor global supply chains without surrendering strategic autonomy

item.title: Shadow Warrior | Why Trump’s claims on the India-US trade deal cannot be taken at face value
item.description: There has been no Indian readout corroborating a number of Donald Trump’s claims, especially on agriculture, which is a red line, a no-go, for India

item.title: Saving the dollar: Why Trump’s India deal matters more to the US
item.description: Why Trump did the deal with India may have nothing to do with agriculture or Russian oil, and everything to do with the dollar

item.title: How US’ Pax Silica is India’s golden opportunity
item.description: The February 4 US-organised ministerial on critical minerals was less an endpoint than a beginning. For India, the participation reinforces its ambition to emerge as a key node in global technology and resource networks
